Plot: A documentary following the controversial captivity of killer whales, and its dangers for both humans and whales.
Title: Blackfish
Writer: Gabriela Cowperthwaite, Eli B. Despres, Tim Zimmermann
Actors: Tilikum, John Hargrove, Samantha Berg, Mark Simmons
tomatoConsensus: Blackfish is an aggressive, impassioned documentary that will change the way you look at performance killer whales.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 7 wins & 35 nominations.
